name: @hyperlane-xyz/multicollateral
description: MultiCollateral solidity contracts and typechain artifacts for Hyperlane

scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm deps:soldeer && forge build && pnpm build:typechain && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:typechain: mkdir -p typechain && find typechain -mindepth 1 -delete && pnpm exec typechain --target ethers-v5 --node16-modules --out-dir typechain out/MultiCollateral.sol/MultiCollateral.json out/MultiCollateralRoutingFee.sol/MultiCollateralRoutingFee.json out/IMultiCollateralFee.sol/IMultiCollateralFee.json
